org.primaresearch.clc.phd.workflow.data

Interface DataPort

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InputPort, LoopPort, OutputPort
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataPortImpl, InputPortImpl, LoopPortImpl, OutputPortImpl

    public interface DataPort
    Interface for data ports (input or output)
    Author:
    clc

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataPort clone() 
      Activity getActivity() 
      DataPort getCollectionPositionProvider()
      The collection position is used for input as well as output ports.
      For input ports it provides the position that is to be used to extract a single data item from a source port that returns a data collection.
      For output ports it specifies the position where to put a single data item that is returned from a forwarded port and the output port is a data collection.
      DataObject getDataObject() 
      java.lang.String getId() 
      void setCollectionPositionProvider(DataPort port)
      The collection position is used for input as well as output ports.
      For input ports it provides the position that is to be used to extract a single data item from a source port that returns a data collection.
      For output ports it specifies the position where to put a single data item that is returned from a forwarded port and the output port is a data collection.
      void setDataObject(DataObject dataObject) 
      void setId(java.lang.String id)

      • getCollectionPositionProvider

        DataPort getCollectionPositionProvider()
        The collection position is used for input as well as output ports.
        For input ports it provides the position that is to be used to extract a single data item from a source port that returns a data collection.
        For output ports it specifies the position where to put a single data item that is returned from a forwarded port and the output port is a data collection.

      • setCollectionPositionProvider

        void setCollectionPositionProvider(DataPort port)
        The collection position is used for input as well as output ports.
        For input ports it provides the position that is to be used to extract a single data item from a source port that returns a data collection.
        For output ports it specifies the position where to put a single data item that is returned from a forwarded port and the output port is a data collection.
